The photos were shared on Facebook on No: 2020, in a post related to the claim.
The photos were captioned with the words: Heartbreaking! Condolences to the families of the children who was [sic] drowned in the flashfloods. #IsabelaNeedsHelp #CagayanNeedsHelp".
The same photos were shared alongside a: 4. Reverse image and keyword searches on Google found that both photos were taken in 2011 after tropical storm Washi hit the southern island of Mindanao, confirming that the claim is false.
